participant_1.background:
My first purchase was a baseball glove for my son.
i like to write poetry in my spare time.
I like to play video games and go for walks with my dog Percy.
i work graveyard in a hotel.
i recently lost both my parents to an automobile accident.

participant_2.background:
I am a free spirit, and I live my life according to my own rules.
I am ready to work, but my car is not.
i love to workout.
i am married with three kids.
I care a lot about social media because I love to share my experiences with others and get feedback.

content.text: I am doing well. How about you?
I am doing ok. I recently lost my parents in a car accident and it is still a little hard to cope with.
I am sorry to hear that. I can't imagine what you are going through. I hope you have a good support system.
Thank you. I do have my son and my friends. I like to spend time with my dog Percy.
I love dogs! I have a dog named Oliver. He is a big part of my family.
That is great. I love spending time with Percy. He is a great listener.
I can relate. Oliver is always there for me to listen to me when I am feeling down.
It is nice to have a furry friend to always be there for you.
Yes it is. They are the best.
I am glad that we are talking. It is nice to talk to someone who understands what I am going through.
I am glad I can help. I am always here to listen if you need to talk.
